about.homeTitle: 一个永久存储和版权确权的内容平台
about.homeDes: 瞬MATATAKI 是一个保护创作者权益的高质量内容平台，通过IPFS协议保障内容的永久可访问和确权信息可查询；使用了Fan票来激励创作者、探索者、布道者共建未来的超级知识链接网络；致力于回归更加开放去中心化的互联网。
about.painPointDes1: 传统创作平台的积分激励手段让参与者感觉自己就是局外人，虽然为平台做出了贡献，可是缺乏公开透明的机制，无法规避平台暗箱操作，可能出现积分失效、积分增发、积分无法流通交易等问题。
about.painPointDes2: 作者创作的内容以及创作行为的数据存在平台数据库，缺乏信任可被随意删改，因此难以证明内容的版权。一旦需要进行法律维权则缺乏有效证据。
about.painPointDes3: 写作爱好者将自己的文笔记录在创作平台、社交网络、微信公众号中。但是这些平台可以对你的内容自由删改，对你的账号随意封禁，网站也可能会停运。
about.programDes1: 冷启动阶段专注于满足用户需求和验证商业模式，通过注意力挖矿和劳动力挖矿获得积分，用积分形式代在产品内部流转。正式启动后按比例映射为生态Token，并给予用户诸多平台权益。
about.programDes2: 瞬MATATAKI采用了星际文件系统（IPFS）协议，每个文件只存在独一无二的一份，减少存储资源浪费，降低存储成本，实现平台资源永不丢失，网站永不关停，保障用户权益永久有效。
about.programDes3: 支持使用EOS、本体等主流公链的去中心化账号登入，平台无法触碰用户私钥。使用IPFS技术记录内容修改操作，任何人包括平台都无法篡改。
about.blockTitle1: 版权永久记录，时间戳高效确权
about.blockDes1:
Blockchain and digital copyright protection can be perfectly combined to solve the current situation of rampant piracy. 
First of all, in the process of right confirmation, the patent application process under the existing mechanism is time-consuming and inefficient. 
The distributed ledger and time-stamping technology of the blockchain makes it possible for the entire network to quickly reach a consensus on the ownership of intellectual property rights, and in theory, timely confirmation of rights can be achieved. 
The asymmetric encryption technology guarantees the uniqueness of the copyright, and the time stamp technology guarantees the copyright owner. The copyright owner can quickly and easily complete the process of confirming the right, which solves the problem of the inefficiency of the traditional right confirmation mechanism.
about.blockTitle2: IPFS存储内容，永久记录不删除
about.blockDes2:
IPFS (InterPlanetary File System) is called InterPlanetary File System in Chinese. It is a hypermedia transmission protocol based on content addressing, versioning, and point-to-point. It integrates P2P network technology, BitTorrent transmission technology, Git version control, self-certified file system, etc. 
Technology that allows participants in the network to store, request, and transmit verifiable data to each other. 
Moreover, the data on the IPFS protocol can be permanently stored on the Web without deleting the data. 
The distributed network that no longer depends on the backbone network can effectively resist hackers' attacks on centralized servers, and user data and privacy can be better protected.
about.blockTitle3: 平台积分奖励，与生态共建者共赢
about.blockDes31: Instant MATATAKI will give back to all co-builders participating in ecological construction!
about.blockDes32: 因为你们付出的注意力帮助我们更好得判断内容质量，你们付出的注意力将直接帮助其他探索者节省时间！
about.blockDes33: 因为你们付出的创作力帮助我们更好的发展壮大，你们付出的创作力将直接帮助每一位探索者进步！
about.blockDes34: 因为你们付出的传播力帮助我们更好得被众人所知，你们付出的传播力将推动世界变得更加美好！
about.stageDes11: 建立内容分享和永久存储的平台
about.stageDes21: 建立版权保护系统与非法行为抗争
about.stageDes22: 打造安全的区块链内容生态
about.stageDes31: 建立人类知识共享和创新的平台
about.stageDes32: 打造区块链永存知识数据库

publish.importInput: Please enter the article URL link, including http(s)://
publish.importDes1: Currently supports: 链闻、橙皮书、微信、知乎专栏、Matters、简书、微博文章、币乎。
publish.importDes2: If an infringement is found in the content published on this platform, the official has the right to remove the work and reserves the right to pursue legal responsibility for the infringer.
publish.importError: Import failed, currently only supports: 链闻、橙皮书、微信、知乎专栏、Matters、简书、微博文章、币乎。
publish.statement: 勾选本原创声明，即代表您确认并承诺该文章，包括文章中的使用的图片等其他元素，是由您本人（或持有该账号之组织）独立创作完成，或者已取得原作权利人的使用许可。有如下情况的文章请勿勾选本原创声明：
publish.statement1: 1.歪曲、篡改、抄袭、剽窃他人创作而产生的作品，
publish.statement2: 2.文章主要篇幅为诸如“法律、法规，国家机关的决议、决定、命令和其他具有立法、行政、司法性质的文件、时事新闻、历法、通用数表、通用表格和公式”等的公共内容；
publish.statement4: 4.大篇幅引用他人内容或文章主要内容为他人作品，如书摘、文摘、报摘等；
publish.statement5: 5.文章主体系整合、汇编他人作品内容
publish.statement6: 6.通过其他侵犯著作权或其他权益方式形成的内容。
publish.statement7: 在取得原作者或权利人同意后，对作品进行改编、翻译再创作的，视同原创。
publish.statement8: 瞬MATATAKI鼓励用户发布原创文章，勾选本原创声明的文章会展示原创标识。但本原创声明仅是您对文章内容原创性的单方承诺，并不表示瞬MATATAKI认可了文章的原创性。若您在勾选本原创声明后，文章被证明并非独立原创，瞬MATATAKI将按照平台规范下架等。

p.ipfsTitle: The content of this article has been uploaded to the Interplanetary File Storage System "IPFS", which is permanently stored and cannot be deleted.
p.ipfsContent: "HASH" is a unique ID generated after a work is uploaded to IPFS. Through HASH, the content of the work can be accessed at different nodes of IPFS.
p.articleWidgetContent:
The widget function can generate a beautiful display card for the current article. 
You can copy the widget code into the article editor of Shun MATATAKI, so that you can insert beautiful article display cards in your article. 
Of course, the article card you show will also have an invitation link function.

p.stepContent2: Click the "Create widget" button to get the code

p.stepContent4: Paste the code into the instant MATATAKI editor to display

header-tips: Please add our official QQ group: 766605671
press-enter-to-create-the-label: Press Enter to create the label
to-set-the-copyright-information-of-your: To set the copyright information of your article, it cannot be modified after publishing
fan-ticket-issuer-and-collaborator-privi: Fan ticket issuer and collaborator privilege function
whether-to-make-the-article-history-publ: Whether to make the article history public
do-you-allow-this-work-to-be-reproduced-: Do you allow this work to be reproduced, excerpted, mixed, or re-created by others?
creative-commons-tips:
CC is a public copyright license agreement that allows the distribution of works protected by copyright. 
A creative sharing license is used for the right of an author to share, use, or even create derivative works for others.
others-can-no-longer-mix-convert-or-crea: Others can no longer mix, convert, or create based on the work, and cannot distribute the modified work
only-secondary-creation-authorized-by-th: Only secondary creation authorized by this agreement is allowed
sa-tips: Anyone who remixes, converts, or creates based on this work must distribute the work based on the same license agreement as the original license agreement.
read-permission-settings-tips: After adding restrictions, readers can view the full text only after holding a certain number of Fan tickets
edit-permission-tips: After adding editing permissions, readers can edit articles after holding a specific number of Fan tickets or paying a specific fee
open-history-article-tips: After enabling the public article history permission, anyone can see the historical version of your article
timed-release-tips: The article does not support modification after successful setting, but it can be unpublished before the set time
the-number-of-additional-issuances-has-r: The number of additional issuances has reached the upper limit
number-of-additional-issuances-the-total: Number of additional issuances (the total issuance is up to 100 million)
the-maximum-issuance-limit-is-100-millio: The maximum issuance limit is 100 million
after-the-first-issuance-is-successful-y: After the first issuance is successful, you can immediately operate the manual additional issuance
the-price-cannot-be-modified-after-setti: The price cannot be modified after setting
enter-the-unit-price-of-your-fan-ticket: Enter the unit price of your Fan ticket
through-train-transfer-to-fan-ticket: Through train transfer to Fan ticket
in-addition-to-the-fan-ticket-sales-chan: In addition to the Fan ticket sales channels outside the exchange, you set the direct purchase price
fan-tickets-in-the-through-train-are-aut: Fan tickets in the through train are automatically sold at the price set by the issuer
the-sales-revenue-will-go-directly-to-th: The sales revenue will go directly to the issuer’s account balance
the-through-train-function-is-only-respo: The through train function is only responsible for Fan ticket sales, not for repurchase or destruction
issuers-can-recharge-their-own-fan-ticke: Issuers can recharge their own Fan tickets into the through train for sale at any time
the-issuer-cannot-directly-retrieve-the-: The issuer cannot directly retrieve the transferred Fan ticket from the through train
please-check-the-order-information-caref: Please check the order information carefully, if it is wrong, please cancel and try again
your-transaction-may-fail-due-to-normal-: Your transaction may fail due to normal price fluctuations, and the expected price fluctuation range will help your transaction succeed. After the transaction is successful, the overpayment amount will be refunded.
when-the-accuracy-of-the-cny-transaction: When the accuracy of the CNY transaction amount is greater than 0.01, it will automatically be paid, and the overpayment amount will be kept in your CNY account.

there-are-no-articles-in-this-favorite-y: There are no articles in this favorite yet

your-transaction-may-fail-due-to-normal-: Your transaction may fail due to normal price fluctuations,
the-expected-price-fluctuation-range-wil: The expected price fluctuation range will help your trading success.
after-the-transaction-is-successful-the-: After the transaction is successful, the overpayment amount will be refunded.
when-the-accuracy-of-the-transaction-amo: When the accuracy of the transaction amount of CNY is greater than 0.01, it will be automatically carried and paid.
the-overpayment-amount-will-be-kept-in-y: The overpayment amount will be kept in your CNY account.
